trends: There have been no other sightings in Coalburg
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Silver, reflective, cigar shaped object hovering above Corridor X (I-22) as I was getting on the interstate at the Coalburg, AL. exit.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter & I were approaching the on ramp to get on I-22 at the Coalburg exit. We both observed an object that was shaped like a cigar & was a very shiny silver color. It reflected the sun. It almost looked like it was mirrored. It hovered there for about 30 seconds then as we were proceeding onto the on ramp we lost it. It just disappeared & was no where in sight. This is now my 3rd ufo sighting in less than a month! (3rd sighting ever!) I am attaching a photo of a picture that I found online that looks like what I saw on the 2nd sighting.
